title: The Unholy Grave
description: After narrowly escaping with their lives, Lincoln, El, and Ben find themselves stuck. Gedeon's lost ring has been captured, Ben has been arrested - facing a lifetime in prison - Eligh is missing, and death has shaken the entire group to their core. All the while Harksmear inches closer to discovering the location of the long lost portal to the Daemon Dimension.
author: Johnathon Nicolaou
